content.raw:
just noticed that in order to use `ign` cmd, we will need to install ign-tools and ign-transport from source. Maybe as we make use of more ign-transport in gazebo, we should start considering rolling out ign-tools debs and installing the ign-transport ruby cmd script.

Other than that, the plugin works as expected
content.html:
just noticed that in order to use ign cmd, we will need to install ign-tools and ign-transport from source. Maybe as we make use of more ign-transport in gazebo, we should start considering rolling out ign-tools debs and installing the ign-transport ruby cmd script.

Other than that, the plugin works as expected
